channel.title: Remote Working AMA, Peldi (Balsamiq) & Bridget Harris (YouCanBookMe)
channel.description:
As if one in a week isn't enough, we're also running an AMA on the topic of **remote working** with the CEO Founders of two distributed companies - YouCanBookMe and Balsamiq.
They are discussing some of the trials and tribulations of remote working.
25th January at 1700 GMT [if you want to join us here](http://businessofsoftware.org/2017/01/ama-bridget-harris-youcanbookme-and-peldi-balsamiq-discuss-remote-working-more/?utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=RemoteWorkinAMA&utm_source=Bootstrapped).
